<style>
   .contact-info-list {
  color: #4b5056;
  font-family: open_sans, Open Sans, sans-serif;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 150%;
}
.contact-info-list > .contact-info-row:not(:last-child) {
  margin: 20px 0;
}
.contact-info-list > .contact-info-row i {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  margin-right: 6px;
}
.contact-info-list > .contact-info-row .qr-code {
  display: block;
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
}
.oneclick-contact-info-dialog {
  position: fixed;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  z-index: 5000;
  display: none;
}
.oneclick-contact-info-dialog .oneclick-contact-info-dialog-content {
  width: 440px;
  max-width: 90%;
  max-height: 80%;
  overflow-y: auto;
  margin: 100px auto 0;
  padding: 30px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  background-color: white;
  color: #4b5056;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-family: open_sans, Open Sans, sans-serif;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-weight: 700;
  box-shadow: 0px 2px 8px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}
.oneclick-contact-info-dialog .oneclick-contact-info-dialog-content .title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  font-size: 20px;
  font-style: normal;
  line-height: 120%;
}
.oneclick-contact-info-dialog .oneclick-contact-info-dialog-content .title .close-button {
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 30px;
}
.oneclick-contact-info-dialog .oneclick-contact-info-dialog-content .tips {
  color: #636972;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 150%;
  margin-top: 10px;
}

<style>
   .oneclick-footer-pbs {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 16px;
  width: 310px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  line-height: 1.5;
  border-top-left-radius: 6px;
  border-top-right-radius: 6px;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #633f97, #493d70);
  margin: auto;
  color: white;
}

  border-color: #f4f6f8;
}
.oneclick-footer-pbs-tooltip .s-kit-tooltip-content .s-kit-tooltip-arrow {
